title: Minnesota Energy Resources
description: A regulated natural gas utility serving communities across Minnesota. Gas Emergencies: 800-889-4970, Customer Service: 800-889-9508
cleaned_text: Delivering safe, clean and reliable natural gas to Minnesota We embrace our responsibility to provide affordable, reliable and clean energy in an environmentally sustainable manner. We work to align our policies and practices with the needs of our key stakeholders, including our customers, communities, employees and investors. Find answers to help manage power needs of your business.
